Title: Relates to prohibiting a diminution of certain employee benefits
Summary: Provides that an employer shall not diminish the benefits granted a participant, or for which such participant is eligible, under an employer welfare benefit plan as such plan was in existence at the time of the retirement of such participant; defines terms.
LawCode: Add Art 4 ยง401, Eld L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to prohibiting a diminution of certain employee benefits
